item.title: Crash: Questionable Ethics / Engine Error: On A Rail
item.dc:creator: rjcuk
item.description:
Two different crashes here:

  1. Questionable Ethics

After you free the scientists from spinning blades and enter the lab foyer, after the doors come down and the military start dropping in, the game crashed. It went all black then closed down, but didn’t see Windows Error Reporting. Attached the minidump (…3C) and screenshot of the Engine Error.
It says: Can’t load lump 53, allocation of 24703737 bytes failed!!!

Haven’t played it back yet so may not be repeatable.

  1. On A Rail

When you get on the yellow tram/cart and it speeds up, the game crashed if I tried to use the slow down/backwards key on the tram. It crashed twice, with hl2.exe as the culprit. Both mindumps attached (…42, …52)
